item.description:
Please bring some pictures, a book, or a magazine article to discuss and inspire conversation!

Park on Central Ave., in the side lot (between La Festa's building and the Barley Pub), around back. I will wait at a table near the entrance (with my Meetup table sign!) until about 7:15. Then, I will move into the larger room with members who have already arrived.

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language Early January Meetup
